evidence_items.text: A tug driving instructor (tug instructor) and trainee tug driver (trainee driver) were seated beside each other in the tug. The flight crew were in communication with the headset operator via the aircraft’s interphone.
The trainee driver decided to stop the pushback and asked the tug instructor to take over.

After swapping seats the instructor recommenced the pushback, correcting the aircraft back onto the taxiway centreline. He continued to reassure and advise the trainee while performing the pushback, looking at her while doing so. The headset operator continued walking on the right side of the tug, abeam its cabin. The wingman was on the left just ahead of the tug.

The aircraft’s nosewheel reached the ‘Tug release point’ (TRP) ground markings. However, it continued moving beyond the TRP with its engine at idle and hit the blast barrier at the end of the cul-de-sac.
The tug instructor pulled the aircraft forward off the fence then stopped the tug.

roots_spec.exclusion_clause: Not explained by any other root
Not explained by any other root
Not explained by any other root
Not explained by any other root

slot_statements.defeater_resistance: The assertion of communication/coordination breakdown among crew is resistant to defeaters based on available evidence and analysis from the Boeing 737-8AS 9H-QAA 12-25 early historical timeframe.
slot_statements.fit_to_key_features: The communication/coordination breakdown among crew aligns with key features of the Boeing 737-8AS 9H-QAA 12-25 incident, including timing, involved personnel, and operational context.

slot_statements.defeater_resistance: The identification of the environmental or marking deficiency must be robust against potential defeaters or counter-evidence within the context of the Boeing 737-8AS 9H-QAA at hist_t1_early.
slot_statements.fit_to_key_features: The environmental or marking deficiency should align with the key features and characteristics defined for such deficiencies in the Boeing 737-8AS 9H-QAA during the specified historical period hist_t1_early.

slot_statements.availability: The procedural deviation in pushback execution was observed and recorded during the Boeing 737-8AS 9H-QAA flight on 12-25 in the hist_t1_early timeframe.
slot_statements.defeater_resistance: The identified procedural deviation in pushback execution withstands potential counterarguments and alternative explanations, confirming its validity within the context of the Boeing 737-8AS 9H-QAA 12-25 hist_t1_early scope.
slot_statements.fit_to_key_features: The procedural deviation aligns with key features identified in pushback operations, including timing, sequence of actions, and adherence to standard protocols for the Boeing 737-8AS 9H-QAA.

node.statement: Communication/coordination breakdown among crew was present and observable during the early historical timeframe of the Boeing 737-8AS 9H-QAA incident on 12-25.

defeaters: Direct evidence of communication or coordination breakdown among crew during early timeframe
Statements indicating smooth or effective communication and coordination

quotes.exact_quote: The flight crew were in communication with the headset operator via the aircraft’s interphone.
The trainee driver decided to stop the pushback and asked the tug instructor to take over.

After swapping seats the instructor recommenced the pushback, correcting the aircraft back onto the taxiway centreline. He continued to reassure and advise the trainee while performing the pushback, looking at her while doing so.

The aircraft’s nosewheel reached the ‘Tug release point’ (TRP) ground markings. However, it continued moving beyond the TRP with its engine at idle and hit the blast barrier at the end of the cul-de-sac.
The tug instructor pulled the aircraft forward off the fence then stopped the tug.

outcome.reasoning_summary: Evidence shows communication between flight crew and headset operator and coordination between tug instructor and trainee, with no direct indication of communication breakdown among crew during early timeframe (H1-H5). The incident involved a pushback overrun but no explicit communication/coordination failure is documented.
outcome.uncertainty_source: absence of explicit evidence about communication breakdown; possible unreported issues

node.statement: Mechanical/control failure was present in the Boeing 737-8AS 9H-QAA on 12-25 during hist_t1_early.

assumptions: The pushback and movement beyond TRP was controlled by tug operators, not aircraft mechanical systems failing.
defeaters: Evidence of actual mechanical or control system malfunction on the aircraft during the event
Reports or data indicating failure in aircraft control systems

quotes.exact_quote: The aircraft’s nosewheel reached the ‘Tug release point’ (TRP) ground markings. However, it continued moving beyond the TRP with its engine at idle and hit the blast barrier at the end of the cul-de-sac.

outcome.reasoning_summary: The evidence describes the aircraft moving beyond the tug release point and hitting a barrier, but does not indicate any mechanical or control failure of the Boeing 737-8AS 9H-QAA. The movement occurred during pushback with tug operators involved, suggesting operational factors rather than mechanical failure (H1-H5).
outcome.uncertainty_source: No direct evidence about mechanical/control system status; ambiguity whether the event was due to mechanical failure or operational error.

node.statement: The environmental or marking deficiency must be present and observable in the Boeing 737-8AS with registration 9H-QAA during the historical time frame hist_t1_early on 12-25.

defeaters: If evidence showed visible or reported environmental or marking deficiencies at the TRP or surrounding area during the incident.
outcome.reasoning_summary: No evidence in the provided history items (H1-H5) mentions any environmental or marking deficiency present and observable on the Boeing 737-8AS with registration 9H-QAA during the specified timeframe.

node.statement: The procedural deviation in pushback execution was observed and recorded during the Boeing 737-8AS 9H-QAA flight on 12-25 in the hist_t1_early timeframe.

defeaters: If evidence showed the aircraft stopped correctly at the TRP without incident
If the event occurred outside the hist_t1_early timeframe or on a different flight

quotes.exact_quote: The aircraft’s nosewheel reached the ‘Tug release point’ (TRP) ground markings. However, it continued moving beyond the TRP with its engine at idle and hit the blast barrier at the end of the cul-de-sac.

outcome.reasoning_summary: The direct observation in H4 confirms a procedural deviation during pushback as the aircraft moved beyond the designated Tug release point and hit a blast barrier, indicating the deviation was observed and recorded in the specified flight and timeframe.

node.statement: The communication/coordination breakdown among crew aligns with key features of the Boeing 737-8AS 9H-QAA 12-25 incident, including timing, involved personnel, and operational context.

assumptions: The described personnel and operational context correspond to the Boeing 737-8AS 9H-QAA 12-25 incident
The pushback operation context is representative of the incident's communication breakdown
defeaters: If evidence showed clear, effective communication and coordination preventing the incident
If timing or personnel involved differed significantly from the described scenario

quotes.exact_quote: A tug driving instructor (tug instructor) and trainee tug driver (trainee driver) were seated beside each other in the tug. The flight crew were in communication with the headset operator via the aircraft’s interphone.
The trainee driver decided to stop the pushback and asked the tug instructor to take over.

After swapping seats the instructor recommenced the pushback, correcting the aircraft back onto the taxiway centreline. He continued to reassure and advise the trainee while performing the pushback, looking at her while doing so. The headset operator continued walking on the right side of the tug, abeam its cabin. The wingman was on the left just ahead of the tug.

The aircraft’s nosewheel reached the ‘Tug release point’ (TRP) ground markings. However, it continued moving beyond the TRP with its engine at idle and hit the blast barrier at the end of the cul-de-sac.

outcome.reasoning_summary: The evidence directly describes the communication and coordination among the tug instructor, trainee, headset operator, and wingman during the pushback operation, including a decision to stop and swap drivers (H1, H2, H3). The aircraft moving beyond the TRP and hitting the blast barrier (H4) indicates a breakdown in coordination and communication consistent with the incident's key features.
outcome.uncertainty_source: Limited detail on exact communication exchanges and timing; no explicit mention of communication failures

node.statement: The environmental or marking deficiency should align with the key features and characteristics defined for such deficiencies in the Boeing 737-8AS 9H-QAA during the specified historical period hist_t1_early.

assumptions: The TRP ground markings mentioned correspond to the key features and characteristics of environmental or marking deficiencies relevant to the Boeing 737-8AS 9H-QAA during hist_t1_early.
defeaters: If additional evidence showed the TRP markings were compliant with standards or clearly visible, or if the aircraft movement was due to other factors unrelated to marking/environmental deficiencies.

quotes.exact_quote: The aircraft’s nosewheel reached the ‘Tug release point’ (TRP) ground markings. However, it continued moving beyond the TRP with its engine at idle and hit the blast barrier at the end of the cul-de-sac.

outcome.reasoning_summary: The evidence H4 directly references the TRP ground markings and the aircraft moving beyond them, indicating a marking deficiency related to the tug release point as defined for the Boeing 737-8AS 9H-QAA during the specified period.
outcome.uncertainty_source: No explicit description of the key features and characteristics of environmental or marking deficiencies for the Boeing 737-8AS 9H-QAA in the specified period is provided, leading to some ambiguity.
